notes.title: Akashdeep birthday bash
notes.details: Celebrating Akashdeep's birthday with friends and family on Saturday. Venue: XYZ Club. Time: 7:00 PM.

notes.title: Complete my MUI training
notes.details: Finish MUI (Material-UI) training modules by Friday. Check for any pending assignments and quizzes.

notes.title: Order a Laptop!
notes.details: Place an order for a new laptop with the following specifications: Processor: Intel Core i7, RAM: 16GB, Storage: 512GB SSD.

notes.title: Buy some vegetables
notes.details: Purchase vegetables for the week: tomatoes, onions, spinach, carrots.

notes.title: Meeting with Team
notes.details: Schedule a team meeting for project updates and collaboration. Choose a suitable time for everyone.

notes.title: Gym Session
notes.details: Hit the gym for a workout session. Focus on cardio and strength training. Duration: 1 hour.
